title: 112_hr2773
content: Establishment of units of the National Guard in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Title 32 (National Guard) Amendments include changes to definitions and branches/organizations to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands along with Puerto Rico. The Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands is included in Title 32 (National Guard) amendments, along with Puerto Rico. This amendment affects various sections by adding the Northern Mariana Islands to the existing provisions related to Puerto Rico. The Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands is added to various sections in Title 32 related to Puerto Rico, including maintenance of troops, drug interdiction, enlistment oath, and adjutants general. Amendments are made to various sections in Title 32 by adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico. This includes details of regular members, termination of appointment, and relief from national guard duty when ordered to active duty. Amendments are made to various sections in Title 32 by adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in the composition of courts-martial, convening authority of courts-martial, and governor's authority. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections alongside Puerto Rico for training, support of training operations, participation in field exercises, and national guard schools. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in various sections for training, support of training operations, participation in field exercises, national guard schools, and issue of supplies. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in various sections for training, support of training operations, participation in field exercises, national guard schools, issue of supplies, and accountability. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in various sections for employment, technicians, property accountability, and disposition of property. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in sections related to the disposition of condemned stores, settlements for property loss, personal injury, death, and homeland defense activities. In Title 10, definitions are amended to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. In Title 32, amendments include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in various sections. In Title 10, definitions are also updated to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. In Title 32, amendments include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in various sections related to the army and air national guard. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections related to the army and air national guard, alongside Puerto Rico. Amendments in Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections related to the army and air national guard, alongside Puerto Rico. Sections in Title 10 are also amended to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in standards and qualifications for commissioned officers and facilities for reserve components. Amendments in Title 10 of the United States Code include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands alongside Puerto Rico in definitions and standards for commissioned officers and reserve components.
